meanings.definition: Small fish used as bait for larger fish.
meanings.sent1: The baitfish swam near the hook.
meanings.sent2: Anglers often use baitfish to catch big fish.
meanings.sent3: The baitfish thought they were going on a fun adventure.
meanings.sent4: In the sea of life, we are all just tiny baitfish.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the baitfish caught the sunlight.

meanings.definition: Fish that are used as bait.
meanings.sent1: The baitfish were carefully placed on the fishing line.
meanings.sent2: The baitfish attracted the attention of hungry predators.
meanings.sent3: The baitfish were relieved they weren't the main course.
meanings.sent4: She dangled the baitfish like a tempting treat.
meanings.sent5: The baitfish wiggled enticingly in the water.
